Audio.Locality: Parque Estatal Carlos Botelho, Sao Paulo state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Songs from a lek from 2-3m up at edge near small marshy area. Humid upper-Tropical zone forest.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Leptotila verreauxi,Vireo olivaceus,Procnias nudicollis,Attila phoenicurus,Hylophilus poicilotis
